LanguageData.VFEM_Wall_Sterile.label: sterile wall
LanguageData.VFEM_Wall_Sterile.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof. Fitted with special cleanliness-enhancing properties to create a sterile environment.
LanguageData.VFEM_Wall_Sterile_Blueprint.label: sterile wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEM_Wall_Sterile_Frame.label: sterile wall (building)
LanguageData.VFEM_Wall_Sterile_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof. Fitted with special cleanliness-enhancing properties to create a sterile environment.
